name: Fairy Song (Diogo Portela)
description:
Use your voice to help the fairy stay alive and stop the forest from becoming on fire! The higher your pitch, the higher the fairy will raise. Avoid the bushes and be careful of the fireballs the evil fairy sends at you!

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2017. It was my first game jam ever and back in the day it allowed me to learn so much about unity, programming, game design and team work. I've reworked a few things for this release so its actually playable this time.

You can check the original version at
https://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/fairy-song

Credits

Thanks to Pedro Guimarães, Carlos Costa and Filipa Maia for participating on the original game. Special thanks to Catarina Lopes for helping us back then when everything was too much.
